mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY rr.room_reserv_id) AS room_reserv_id, r.room_name, m.member_name, rr.proposal, REGEXP_REPLACE(rr.room_reserv_date, '(.{4})(.{2})(.{2})', '\1-\2-\3') AS room_reserv_date, rr.room_reserv_start_time, rr.room_reserv_end_time - rr.room_reserv_start_time as room_reserv_end_time FROM room r JOIN room_reserv rr ON r.room_id = rr.room_id JOIN member m ON m.member_id = rr.member_id
